item.title: Jenny add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "An integral part of any best friend's job is to immediately clear your computer history if you die." -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Cara McKenna
Jenny add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "Well, that sucked more ass than liposuction." -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "Oh, I forgot to mention it: My brother is the kind of man whom women stalk. In cooperative packs." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Kristen Ashley
item.description: "He isn't my man." "Girl, it don't matter you don't think he is, he thinks he is. Therefore in Badass Motherfucker Land, that means he is." -- Kristen Ashley

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Kristen Ashley
item.description: "I figured the Nightingale Investigations job application form had the question "Are you hot? Yes. No. If you answered no, please exit the building." -- Kristen Ashley

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description:
"The man once wrote: Do not meddle in the affairs of wizards, for they are subtle and quick to anger. Tolkien had that one mostly right.
I stepped forward, let the door bang closed, and snarled, "Fuck subtle." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "She's like a hurricane on crystal meth." -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Jennifer L. Armentrout
item.description: "Beautiful face. Beautiful body. Horrible attitude. It was the holy trinity of hot boys." -- Jennifer L. Armentrout

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Darynda Jones
item.description: "He was like chocolate-covered heroin, and I was an addict through and through." -- Darynda Jones

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "One of the lambs fixed its attention on Jared. “Baa,” it flirted. “Boo,” said Jared. “Oh my God, Jared. Don’t tough-talk the lambs.” "It was giving me a funny look." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Louise Rennison
item.description: "What in the name of Hitler's panties and matching bra set was she talking about?" -- Louise Rennison

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Kristen Ashley
item.description: "So, now you’re getting shot at, you’re gonna leave me?” “Girlie, I’m from Texas. We shoot at each other to say good morning." -- Kristen Ashley

item.title: Jenny add a quote by R.L. Mathewson
item.description: "We all fuck up when it comes to our women and you will too. The key is to make her love you more than you piss her off,” Jason added. “It’s a very delicate balance." -- R.L. Mathewson

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Tammara Webber
item.description: "Bonus: I now knew what Erin meant by lickable abs." -- Tammara Webber

item.title: Jenny add a quote by R.L. Mathewson
item.description: "Oh my god are you talking about stalking me?" "yes, but if it comes before a judge we'll just call it a little misunderstanding," he said with a shrug." -- R.L. Mathewson

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "I know it's not thematically in tune with my new job and all, but I find it effective. Build a man a fire and he's warm for a day," I say. "But set a man on fire and he's warm for the rest of his life. Tao of Pratchett. I live by it." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Kristen Ashley
item.description: "<b>The Law</b> and her sidekick, <b>Tex, <i>the Crackpot Coffee Guy</i></b> were on the job." -- Kristen Ashley

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "My soul is wrapped in harsh repose, Midnight descends in raven-colored clothes, But soft... behold! A sunlight beam Butting a swath of glimmering gleam. My heart expands, 'tis grown a bulge in it, Inspired by your beauty... Effulgent." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "Your soul is like the souls of a thousand monkeys on crack, all smushed together." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Kristen Ashley
item.description: "When Luke’s ready, mark my words, he’ll get his own f**kin’ woman and God save us all." -- Kristen Ashley

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Louise Rennison
item.description: "Everyone is so bloody keen on me thinking all of a sudden. It's not what I do." -- Louise Rennison

item.title: Jenny add a quote by R.L. Mathewson
item.description: "How dare you touch my cookies, you bastard!” Jason said in utter disgust before popping the cookie into his mouth and heading back to his house. “Damn those looked good, too,” Brad grumbled. Haley sighed. “Don’t worry I have a second plate on my counter.” The words were barely out of her mouth when Jason abruptly changed course and headed towards her house. “Well, there was,” she said, watching Jason walk into her house like he owned it. A minute later he walked out of her house, carrying both plates and the gallon of milk she had in her fridge. He headed back to his house, but not before he glared at Brad. “You cookie thieving bastard,” they heard him mutter. Brad rolled his eyes, chuckling. “And people wonder how I lost weight rooming with him in college." -- R.L. Mathewson

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Tom Waits
item.description: "I like beautiful melodies telling me terrible things." -- Tom Waits

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Tom Waits
item.description: "I don't go to church on Sunday, don't get on my knees to pray, or memorize the books of the Bible, I got my own special way" -- Tom Waits

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Tom Waits
item.description: "I've lost my equilibrium, my car keys, and my pride." -- Tom Waits

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Tom Waits
item.description: "When the weather's rough and it's whiskey in the rain it's best to wrap your savior up in cellophane." -- Tom Waits

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Tom Waits
item.description: "Your old home town's so far away, but inside your head there's a record that's playing, a song called 'Hold On" -- Tom Waits

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Tom Waits
item.description: "but it's so hard to dance that way when it's cold and there's no music." -- Tom Waits

item.title: Jenny add a quote by Tom Waits
item.description: "The large print giveth and the small print taketh away." -- Tom Waits
